name: Rajput Matrimony - Vivah, Marriage App For Rajputs
description: Rajput Matrimony App, part of CommunityMatrimony, is the most trusted matrimony service for Rajput across the world. You can choose Rajput Bride and Groom Profiles from major cities across Uttar Pradesh, India and NRIs from abroad. Thousands of Rajput have successfully found their life partner here. You too can find a Perfect Match. 100% Safe and Secure App. Register FREE.   Top Rajput Matrimony App Features:  - Free Registration - User friendly interface and easy partner search options  - Get daily matches on mobile and email - Express your interest to shortlisted matches - Get instant alerts when there is a communication  - Shortlist and save potential matches - Interact with other members using the chat feature  Lakhs of registered members are from all major Rajput community sub-castes such as Chauhan, Singh, Thakur, Rathore, Lodhi Rajput, Parmar / Pawar, Bais, Chandel, Rana, Sisodia and more..  We have members from major cities in India like Delhi, Ahmedabad, Surat, Ghaziabad, Mumbai, Gandhinagar, Rajkot, Patna, Vadodara, Indore, Faridabad and etc., besides Rajput NRIs from India, United States of America, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, United Arab Emirates and Etc.  You can find brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Regions & Sub Castes, Our databases of Hindi Rajput aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life. Download app today and find your life partner!  Get the Premium Advantage  A Premium Membership means: - You can talk directly to the opposite match - You can get contact details including phone number, mail id and address.  - You can also chat live with members you like - You can send personalised messages to people you like  Rajput Matrimony App is part of Community Matrimony from Matrimony.com, which also offers language based matrimonial service like Hindi Matrimony. The app is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences that a bride or groom might have while choosing their life partner. The Rajput Matrimony App is intelligently developed to give you the best results while matching you with your life partner.  You can also find your partner from other Regional Apps of Bharat Matrimony including Hindi Matrimony.  Thousands of Rajput from across Uttar Pradesh, India and the world have found their perfect life partner here.  The Rajput Matrimony App is light and easy to use and it occupies very little phone space.  So, what are you waiting for? Download the RajputMatrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
